meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Helen Hostetter Mickey McLaurin Christopher Short Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6124.

td.p: Helen Hostetter, a homemaker from Jamaica Plain, Massachusetts
Mickey McLaurin, a research and grants administrator from Oxford, Mississippi
Christopher Short, a pub trivia editor from Crawfordsville, Indiana (whose 4-day cash winnings total $65,999)

tr.td: THE GALAPAGOS ENVIRONMENT
(Alex: You'll join Kelly and me in that part of the world.)
DISNEY FILM BY CHARACTER
(Alex: You have to identify the film.)
HIGHWAYS & BYWAYS
TV ALPHABET
(Alex: We'll give you some famous initials. You identify the entity for us.)
WATERFALLS
"AZ" I WAS SAYING

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Kelly of the Clue Crew gives the clue from Galapagos in Ecuador.) With its fragile ecosystem in danger from events like a 2001 oil tanker wreck, the Galapagos turned to energy sources like this; 3 turbines for it were installed in 2007')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Kelly of the Clue Crew gives the clue from Galapagos in Ecuador.) With its fragile ecosystem in danger from events like a 2001 oil tanker wreck, the Galapagos turned to energy sources like this; 3 turbines for it were installed in 2007

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Christopher
Mickey
Helen
MATERIALS
BRITISH MONARCHS
"S"HOES
THAT'S GOTTA HURT!
KNOCK U OUT
(Alex: Each response will be two words--exactly the same, except one will be missing the letter "U".)
